org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress.aircompressor

Class SnappyCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.compress.aircompressor.SnappyCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class SnappyCodec
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec
    Hadoop snappy codec implemented with aircompressor.

    This is data format compatible with Hadoop's native snappy codec.
